body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Roger Perez and I am a representative of Luxe Hotels Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Angela Flores.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Angela! To assist you better, could you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two five zero three, eight, one nine eight zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Angela. Can you also confirm the last four digits of the phone number on your account for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for sharing that information, Angela. Is there anything specific you would like assistance with today regarding our hotel amenities?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I didn't realize there was a spa available, that's a pleasant surprise!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Angela! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to let me know. Thank you for your time today!
